data.message: Please put the option back front and center for chronological sorting! I hate seeing old news, out of order updates etc! I shouldn't have to go to so many steps to do that!

replies.message: Hi Beth. We've invested a lot to understand how News Feed can show the most engaging content to the majority of people. Top Stories is the result of our findings, which is why it is the default. We know that some people prefer the Most Recent view, so we've kept this option available. If you have specific thoughts you want to share, please let us know here: http://bit.ly/2cHoeiS. -Jessica
Facebook I and most of my friends really dislike Top Stories. We switch to Most Recent whenever we open facebook. Why not let people choose and keep it that way instead of changing it?
Agreed. i have no idea why i have this as the top of my news feed when its more then a month old.
